tools.ieee754.title: IEEE 754 Floating Point
tools.ieee754.description: View IEEE 754 binary representation of floating-point numbers
tools.ieee754.aboutDesc: IEEE 754 is the international standard for floating-point arithmetic, defining the binary representation format for floating-point numbers. Single precision (float32) uses 1 sign bit, 8 exponent bits, and 23 mantissa bits; double precision (float64) uses 1 sign bit, 11 exponent bits, and 52 mantissa bits.
